sense.name: prevent, avoid
sense.examples: He deflected my insult with a wave of his hand. A U.S. District Court judge has deflected the health-effects litigation. Shakespeare deftly deflected his mocking against the Queen to his poetry. Nick Stock deflected the puck over Barnes's shoulder. The metal sheet deflected the beam of light nicely. Landslide debris has deflected the river channel. The C.E.O. deflected his competitors from his purchase.
